section.heading: Applicability of District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act.
section.text: The provisions of the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act (§ 2-501 et seq.) shall apply to each proceeding, decision, or other administrative action specified in this unit, unless otherwise specifically provided.

annotations.annotation: Sept. 24, 1976, D.C. Law 1-85, title VII, § 710, 23 DCR 2464
